mdRecord.dcterms:description: Call for the liberation of Palestine, with responses. Public intoxication. Russian phrase with date. Not entirely legible comment about Keats and Yeats, with response. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
